title: Trump proposes weaker vehicle mileage rules, cutting climate policies
description: The proposal would would significantly reduce fuel economy requirements, encouraging vehicles that burn more fuel.
content: United States President Donald Trump has announced a proposal to weaken vehicle mileage rules for the auto industry, loosening regulatory pressure on car makers to control pollution from petrol-power… [+5583 chars]
